hero_description: Our goal is for every entrepreneur to build their business consciously, through education, environment, and responsibility. Turning knowledge into systemic solutions and energy into results.
swiper_card_1_item: Created for big impact — ready to go global
swiper_card_1_describe: MIX opens new markets and international cooperation opportunities by connecting to networks of different countries.
swiper_card_2_describe: MIX opens doors to new markets and international collaboration through connecting to country networks.

packages.title: BIRLASH ASOS Package
packages.details:
‘Asos’ — foundation, structure, system. Designed for entrepreneurs who want to strengthen the foundation of their business: discipline, control, and awareness.

Everything from BIRLASH ASOS package, plus club events (4 formats):
- Thematic Talks — meetings with speakers and experts.
- Mastermind Sessions — group business analysis with mentors and psychologists.
- Business Breakdown — deep analysis of participants’ business cases.
- Business Gap — informal meetings and open discussions about business.

packages.title: BIRLASH O‘SISH Package
packages.details:
‘O‘sish’ — growth, development, interaction.

Designed for entrepreneurs who want to grow their business, implement new solutions, and exchange experience with other leaders. Practice, analysis, and team growth.

Everything from BIRLASH ASOS package, plus club events (4 formats):
- Thematic Talks — meetings with speakers and experts.
- Mastermind Sessions — group business analysis with mentors and psychologists.
- Business Breakdown — deep analysis of participants’ business cases.
- Business Gap — informal meetings and open discussions about business.

packages.title: BIRLASH TA’SIR Package
packages.details:
Educational blocks (5 directions):
- Marketing
- Finance
- Taxes & Legal Structure
- Franchise & Scaling
- Automation & Management Processes

All club event formats:
- Thematic Talks
- Mastermind Sessions
- Fail Talk — honest meetings about failures and lessons.
- Company Visits — visits to resident companies, exchange of practices.
- Business Gap Evenings — informal business evenings.

feedback_text_form_card: Leave a request and we will contact you.

monitorSection.text_1: YOU WILL HAVE ACCESS TO ALL MY BRANCHES WHEREVER YOU ARE. ALL OUR BRANCHES ARE IN UZBEKISTAN FOR UZBEKISTAN.
